data.description: Offers a competitive interest rate and up to 55 days interest free* on Visa purchases
data.name: Visa Classic

fees.name: Emergency card replacement fee- Outside Australia
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a replacement card is requested to be delivered within 5 days

fees.name: Emergency card replacement fee- within Australia
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a replacement card is requested to be delivered within 5 days

fees.name: Overseas currency coversion fee
fees.additionalInfo: Fee is calculated on the Australian dollar amount of the transaction

discounts.description: Waived when you spend $25,000/annum and over on Visa Purchases

fees.name: Cash advance fee
fees.additionalInfo: Transaction Cash Advance Fee applies whenever one of the following transactions are performed; Cash withdrawal, cheque withdrawal, periodic payment, direct debit, manual transfer or debit transfer counter transactions at a Heritage Branch; ATM/EFTPOS cash withdrawal or transfer within Australia or overseas*; Cash withdrawal over the counter at another financial institution (domestically or overseas*); Heritage Access Line Transfer; Heritage Online transfer (including payments made by Mobile Banking and New Payments Platform transfers) and withdrawals through Bank@Post (including purchase withdrawals with a cash out component). Other fees may also be applicable for certain cash advance transactions.
fees.additionalValue: 2% of the withdrawal amount (minimum fee of $2.50) (Other fees may also be applicable for certain cash advance transactions) Transactions performed in a currency other than Australian Dollar (AUD) also have Overseas Currency Conversion Fee charged Withdrawal transactions performed on your Credit Card account through a Bank@Post agency will also include a Bank@Post Cash Withdrawal Fee.s may also be applicable for certain cash advance transactions) *Transactions performed in a currency other than Australian Dollar (AUD) also have Overseas Currency Conversion Fee charged ^Withdrawal transactions performed on your Credit Card account through a Bank@Post agency will also include a Bank@Post Cash Withdrawal Fee

fees.name: Overseas ATM or counter withdrawals (Visa)
fees.additionalInfo: Overseas currency conversion fee is added to base fee

fees.name: Replacement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a replacement card is requested. In each successive 12 month period

fees.name: Supplementary Visa Card Fee
fees.additionalInfo: On the issue of the third and each subsequent visa card on issue on your card account

fees.name: Statement replacement fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a copy of a previous statement is requested

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a direct debit authorised to be made from or to your account is dishonoured

fees.name: Default fee
fees.additionalInfo: If a payment remains outstanding after its due date

fees.name: Periodic Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: For each periodic payment from your card account

fees.name: Document/Record Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever we provide a copy of a document relating to your card account at your request

fees.name: Heritage Cheque Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a payment from your card account is made by a cheque drawn by us

fees.name: Sweep Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever you place a sweep on your card account to allow funds to be drawn from it and transferred to another Heritage account to meet drawings on that other account.

fees.name: Manual Transfer Fee- Heritage account
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever we manually transfer funds from your card account.

fees.name: Manual Transfer Fee-External Payee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever we manually transfer funds from your card account.

fees.name: Telegraphic Transfer Fee- Within Australia
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a payment from your card account is telegraphically transferred.

fees.name: Telegraphic Transfer Fee- Outside Australia
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a payment from your card account is telegraphically transferred.

fees.name: Interest recalculation fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever you ask us to recalculate interest on your card account

fees.name: Special Request Transaction Listing Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a listing of transactions between two given dates is issued on your card account

fees.name: Coin Deposit fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a deposit of loose coins (unless they are correctly bagged and counted) is made to your card account

fees.name: Overseas Cheque Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Whenever a cheque in foreign currency is deposited to your card account

fees.name: RTGS Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When a payment/transfer to your card account via RTGS occurs

fees.name: SMS Banking- SMS Alerts
fees.additionalInfo: If an SMS alert is delivered by SMS to your mobile phone

fees.name: Package Annual Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When your Card Account is the nominated Visa credit card for a Package and you meet the Package Eligibility Criteria Package containing solely Home Advantage Package eligible Loans / Facilities. $300 per year - Package including Professional Package eligible Loans / Facilities. Fee waived if total outstanding balance owing on anniversary date, on all eligible loans linked to the Package, is equal to or more than $500,000.00. Once all Professional Package eligible Loans / Facilities are repaid in full and your Package contains solely Home Advantage Package eligible Loans / Facilities, you agree that the Package Fee for Packages containing solely Home Advantage Package eligible Loans / Facilities (see above) will apply from the date on which the last Professional Package eligible Loan / Facility is repaid in full.

features.additionalInfo: Bank@Post facility available.  Minimum deposit of $20, maximum deposit of $3,000, minimum withdrawal of $20, maximum withdrawal of $1,000.

features.additionalValue: Internet, Mobile and Phone banking available
Google Pay, Samsung Pay, Fitbit Pay, Garmin Pay, Apple Pay

features.additionalInfo: Access to emergency cash disbursement worldwide with Visa Global Customer Assistance Service. Cash disbursement must be within the available credit limit of your card. (Fees and limits may apply).

On Visa purchases only. Excludes cash advances, interest charges, credit fees and charges, disputed transactions, foreign exchange purchases, travellers cheques, credit card payments, gambling chip purchases, bill payments using BPAY® or utility bills paid over the counter at a financial institution or Bank@Post outlet
features.additionalValue: Heritage Credits, Earn 1 Heritage Credit for every $1,300 spend per calendar month.

features.additionalInfo: If Purchase Transactions made on your account may be eligible for an interest free period, then to be eligible for that interest free period you must pay your Closing Balance as shown on your most recent statement in full by the applicable Due Date. If you do not pay your Closing Balance in full by the applicable Due Date, then your outstanding balance of Purchase Transactions shown on the most recent statement will attract interest as per Section 8. Interest. of the Guide to Heritage Credit Card Products.
Periodical payments and Direct debits available
Minimum repayment based on percentage of outstanding balance is 3% or $30.00 whichever is the greater, plus overlimit or past due amounts.
features.additionalValue: Monthly repayments at 3% of balance or $30

features.additionalInfo: Visa's Zero Liability policy covers Australian issued cards and does not apply to ATM transactions, transactions not processed by Visa or certain commercial card transactions, conditions apply. Cardholders should review their transactions regularly and notify Heritage promptly of any unauthorised Visa use or contact Heritage to find out more. You should be aware if you submit an unauthorised Visa transaction request, Heritage will need to review your request before provisional credit may be provided.
Wide range of payment options including BPAY, automatic credit card payments, internet banking transfers, and over-the-counter at your local branch
Balance enquiries and cash advances at Heritage ATMs
Set up Email or SMS alerts to keep track of transactions on your account
Cancel or place your card on hold, block online, international, in-store or all card payments in our Mobile Banking App in our Mobile Banking App
